Colby Frashure

About me.

Hello! My name is Colby. I'm an audio generalist with experience in production and composition. I'm a transfer student from the University of Delaware currently at the University of Maryland, Baltimore County studying Computer Science. Despite this, I mainly pursue music and have been heavily involved with the music scene, both in my home state of Maryland and at my former University in Delaware. I hope I can apply my creatively analytical approach of client fulfillment to any of your musical needs. Scroll below to see my most notable skills.

 

Projects I have worked on.

  • Session Work and Songwriting

  • Engineering, Production, Live Sound

  • Video Game Composition and Arrangement

  • Game Development Portfolio
